contents.title: Hello there, I'm Trung - a javascript developer! ü•ë

children.value: Hello there, I'm Trung - a javascript developer! ü•ë

passionate about coding and lifelong learning. I created this space to document everything I've learned throughout the year, share my experiences, and translate valuable content into Vietnamese to make it more accessible to a wider audience.

As a software developer with over 4 years of experience, I've had the opportunity to work in industries like business banking, health insurance, and HRM software. My primary focus is on frontend development, especially with technologies like
. I've also worked extensively with frameworks and libraries such as
, all while continuously striving to improve the quality of the products I help build.
Thanks for visiting, and I hope that you will find something valuable here.
Vue.js, Angular, Nuxt, NodeJS, MongoDB, SCSS, Vitest, Vite, RxJS, Micro FE
Vue Router, Pinia, Vuex, VueUse, Element UI, Vuetify, PrimeVue

contents.title: Introduction to Vue 3
contents.description: A beginner's guide to getting started with Vue 3.

children.value: Vue.js 3 is a progressive JavaScript framework for building user interfaces on the web. It's designed to be incrementally adoptable and can easily scale between a library and a full-featured framework.
Vue 3 comes with several exciting features that make it an excellent choice for developers:
This new API provides a set of additive, function-based APIs that allow flexible composition of component logic.
Vue 3 features a faster virtual DOM and improved runtime performance.
Vue 3's codebase is written in TypeScript, allowing for better TypeScript integration.
Here's a basic Vue 3 application setup:
